item.description:
COME JOIN THE FUN!  VEGAN POTLUCK!  May 14th 

On Tuesday, May 14th at 6 pm, Reverence for Life will host our final Vegan potluck of the year at First Parish in Concord.  All are welcome.  You don’t have to be vegan or vegetarian to join the fun. 

If you don't like to cook or don't have a recipe just bring a salad or some crusty bread.  There will be plenty of food for all! 

Children are of course welcome, and we will be eating early to get them home to bed!!!  

We ask that you please:  

-Bring a dish that is free of meat, fish, dairy (butter, milk and cheese) and egg so that everyone can sample every dish!

-Bring your own wine, beer or beverage. 

-Bring your own plate, silverware and napkins and cups to reduce paper waste and cleanup. 

We will have paper if you forget.  

**Because our dinners have been so successful, we are incurring more expenses. This is certainly a wonderful problem to have, but, it means our facility costs are greater, including the need for two sextons to help with set-up and clean-up.  We are asking that those attending help cover these expenses by making a $1 per person donation.
item.name: Vegan Potluck Dinner at First Parish UU Church in Concord, MA
